website_summaries.verdict: The Propet Warner was well-received by a lot of people because it was stylish and comfortable. It was also reasonably priced, supportive, and lightweight. However, there were complaints that the footwear was stiff and not durable. But in the end, though it was commended for the comfort it delivered because it was small and narrow, many had to return it.
pros: Almost all of the owners stated that the Propet Warner was a very comfortable pair of walking shoes right out of the box
Plenty of reviewers claimed that the fit was perfect
The trainer felt supportive, especially for multiple consumers who have foot issues
The aesthetics and color options pleased several folks
The footgear was reasonably priced given its quality build, said some users
A handful of testers liked that the footwear felt light on their feet
cons: Numerous shoppers ranted that the Propet Warner was small and narrow compared to other models of the same size and width, so they had to return it
The stiffness of the trainer displeased some wearers because their feet felt tired after using it
A few critics complained about durability issues
the outsole detached and the leather upper chipped off

customer_reviews.title: Not a 5E shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 5E shoe, as it claims. It only measures about 4 3/4” across the ball of the foot. A true 5E should be at least 5 3/4”. This is becoming a common problem among all shoe manufacturers. I returned these and will be ordering the next size up and see if that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Not As Wide As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Propet walking shoes with velcro straps. They were 3E width at they fit fine. I got a pair of these shoes in 3E width (from another source) and had to return them. I got the 5E width from Amazon and they fit fairly well. Rather surprising that these shoes varied in width so much.
customer_reviews.author: BeachEd

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they are a pretty nice shoe with good cushion and support
customer_reviews.text: I usually order NB 4E shoes, but I tried these for the first time in 5E and they fit smaller than my old pair of NB 4E shoes. Otherwise they are a pretty nice shoe with good cushion and support, but next time I'll order the 6E..Had to, and still using my shoe stretcher every night to try and widen them.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 5E. Yeah, very wide and hard to fit. This is my sixth pair that I wear to work out and walk seven miles every day. My previous foot problems are gone for good. No more callouses, corns or Mortons Neuroma.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The whole point of buying these wider shoes is that ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of buying these wider shoes is that they be, well, wider. They ARE wide by "normal" standards, but not the 5E as described. They're usable, but just. However, they seem of solid quality and look decent, and the price I paid was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lane

customer_reviews.title: Very poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Both left & right shoes splayed outward on outside ankle part of shoe - See Photo.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: i usually get shoes 4E but this time i tried 5E
customer_reviews.text: too wide for me too loose i give to a friend his foot too wider than me
customer_reviews.author: Steven M.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I have not experienced any of what the neg comments proclaim. I wish I would have bought 3 more pairs when they were on sale. Very comfortable and high quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lingner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes at a Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother is diabetic and has trouble finding shoes that fit properly. I bought these for him and he absolutely loves them. I will definitely buy some more because I have two other brothers suffering from diabetes. Plus the price was very reasonable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiowa Rain

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband - who stated, "They ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband - who stated, "They came out of the box feeling broke in!". That is a HUGE compliment from someone who has to be hyper aware of his feet. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: raka1214

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them.
customer_reviews.text: They were way too small, but seller gave a quick refund on return. I like the shoes, though, Quality construction.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on all of the positive things I heard about this brand. I needed a decent looking shoe that had good support. Sadly, these shoes didn't fit the bill. They were way to big and had a strange fit. I can't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I've purchased Propets in the past and loved them, but these were far too small and narrow for the stated size. Also very stiff, hard and uncomfortable. Tongue material was also sub-par material and frayed.
customer_reviews.author: Roosterx55

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are the best for standing on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for my cousin. He is so happy. They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dorline Bosboom

customer_reviews.title: After trying several sizes and styles of Propet shoes, ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying several sizes and styles of Propet shoes, I have come to the conclusion that propet shoes are just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely great and at a good price. will definitely buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: NICE BUT NOT A GOOD FIT.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Nice quality, but not a good fit for his feet. Returned for a refund with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Lisanti

customer_reviews.title: THEY PROBABLY WILL FIT BETTER AFTER WEARING A FEW TIMES
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO BE A LITTLE SMALL, THEY PROBABLY WILL FIT BETTER AFTER WEARING A FEW TIMES.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described no problems. Exactly what I needed. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sapienza

customer_reviews.title: but he says he will love them.
customer_reviews.text: My spouse hasn't worn them except to try on, but he says he will love them.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Still the same great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Propets for years. Still the same great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pseudonym

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy fit nice and sneaker looks great very happy
customer_reviews.author: PAUL R MONCK SR

customer_reviews.title: False Size information
customer_reviews.text: Advertised size incorrect. Was not 4E. Was only a regular D. Painful to wear!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Astute shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Found they fit great and no issues or flaws. Next test is to see how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: i just think it didn't fit me the way I ...
customer_reviews.text: i just think it didn't fit me the way I needed it to. but I thought over all it was ok
customer_reviews.author: shadee

customer_reviews.title: I like the but the bottom of the shoe started to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the but the bottom of the shoe started to come unglued by the heal i think the quality should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Ponjolly

customer_reviews.title: Clearer product information needed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the shoes after reading about the product. I chose a size larger than I normally do. The shoes are too narrow and not flexible at all. A medium width was sent without an option for a wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little stiff
customer_reviews.text: There is a removable insert under the foot cushion. It was tight until I took it out. Runs a little smaller than the cliff walkers
customer_reviews.author: charles king

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was advertised as being "4E", but the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was advertised as being "4E", but the size was shipped as a "3E" and was a bit too narrow. So, I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe, lightweight. Time will tell if the shoes hold up or wear out.
customer_reviews.author: ChemE76

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband and he loves them, beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this brand before in this same size and this were narrower then ones I had before. Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Other proper shoes 12 3e Fit fine. This model / style really small n tight
customer_reviews.text: Other proper shoes 12 3e Fit fine . This model / style really small n tight . I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: andy coronado

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received a 3e width instead of the 4e ordered. Needed to return product
customer_reviews.author: John A Freyek

product_meta.title: Propet Men's Warner Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Contemporary athletic styling make this walking shoe a great option for everyday wear. the rubber outsole paired with a memory foam insole means hours of cushioned comfort.
feature_bullets: Antimicrobial dri-lex lining and sock lining
